4. **Remember, you are strong.** You have faced challenges before, and you will face them again. You are capable of overcoming this.

If you ever feel like you can't go on, please remember that **there is always help available.** Call a crisis hotline, text a support group, or speak to a mental health professional. Your life is valuable, and you deserve to live it to the fullest.
